description: This file defines a 'Header' component for a LightningJS-based frontend application. It includes props, template, state, computed properties, and methods for displaying and interacting with header UI elements such as title, note count, and action buttons.

classes.name: Header
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing the header UI with title, note count, and action buttons.

methods.name: $createNote
methods.description: Triggers the onNew callback when the 'New' button is pressed.

methods.name: $deleteNote
methods.description: Triggers the onDelete callback if deletion is permitted when the 'Delete' button is pressed.
